item.title: Samsung HW-Q990D Review: Atmos Tested, Gamer Approved
item.description: Samsung’s celebrated flagship soundbar does just enough to beat out the rest of its Dolby Atmos competitors.

item.title: The Best Tested and Reviewed Mesh Wi-Fi Routers of 2024
item.description: Forget about patchy internet connections and dead spots in the house. These WIRED-tested multiroom mesh systems will get you online in no time.

item.title: The Year Villainy Won
item.description: Villains were everywhere and more relatable than ever. Across pop culture, social media, and IRL, the phenomenon went full-on main character.

item.title: Beyond Meat Says Being Attacked Has Just Made It Stronger
item.description: The plant-based-meat company’s CEO, Ethan Brown, credits a series of attack ads with prompting a potentially sector-saving change of plan.

item.title: The Year of the AI Election Wasn’t Quite What Everyone Expected
item.description: Deepfakes were nothing like the political force in 2024 that many feared—but that doesn’t mean that generative AI didn’t profoundly affect elections a...
